# credentialID

**Instance Property**

The credential identifier for this passkey credential identity.

## Declaration

```swift
var credentialID: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the credential identifier, along with the [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASPasskeyCredentialIdentity/userHandle], to identify the correct credential to use for a given relying party request.

## Distinguishing identities

- **recordIdentifier**: A string used to correlate this identity to a record in your app’s own database.
